item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, March 16, 2025 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:

9. Meticulous (YC S21) is hiring to eliminate E2E UI tests ( | hide)

25. Show HN: I Built a Customer Feedback Tool (18 points | 19 comments)
26. Lego says it wants to start to bring video game development in-house (145 points | 85 comments)
27. Toni Morrison's Lost Play (14 points | 1 comment)
